LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: Hi. I saw you, walking back and forth in the carriage, here and there! I'm a busy person, why do I have to talk to you all of a sudden? Listen to me, I don't owe anybody anything! Semyon: 'This lady is obviously tense, if I want to talk to her, I should choose my words very carefully, so as not to cause aggression.'

responses.response: Hi, be polite, madam, I wanted to know if there were any empty seats in the cabin.
Why are you yelling? Calm down, let's just talk.
Sorry, I was just passing by, I was on my way out.
Hello, I totally agree with you, I just wanted to stand here for a moment in pleasant company.

LinesAnswers.name: Step1
LinesAnswers.line: You're a pretty polite guy, you know I'm so tired, I keep getting calls for work, these noodles can't do anything without me, as always! I'm on vacation and I want to rest and enjoy life, and these annoying subordinates only give me new wrinkles.

responses.response: Perhaps you should relax, these amateurs will figure it out for themselves.
You've just taken on too many responsibilities, the dudes at work need to step it up.
Vacation - it's great, look what a great weather, and things will slowly get done, you need to think about yourself too, you need to rest.

LinesAnswers.name: Step1Failed
LinesAnswers.line: I don't want to talk anymore.

LinesAnswers.name: Step1Passed
LinesAnswers.line: Hmm... Yes, perhaps they can manage without some of my advice. This train is so boring, so oppressive, where can one have a decent time?

responses.response: There's a bunch of hunks in the previous car, you can have fun with them, they can give you protein.
I think there's a chance to get that guy to share the pies.
I've heard that this train has a restaurant car, it has delicious gourmet food and great service.

LinesAnswers.name: Step2Failed
LinesAnswers.line: What are you talking about?! The one who really needs a rest is you.

LinesAnswers.name: Step2Passed
LinesAnswers.line: That's just what I needed! That is it, I am going there, the main thing is to be back at least by tomorrow morning, not to sit there until noon next day.
